title: Adizero Ubersonic 4 Tennis Shoes
subtitle: Women's Tennis
description: Speed buys time. Time earns points. That's why these adidas Adizero Ubersonic 4 tennis shoes were designed to get you to the ball faster. Their foot-hugging stretch-woven upper and external heel counter keep you strapped in for explosive sprints. Internal reinforcements add extra stability through slides and sidesteps. Underneath, a low-profile Lightstrike midsole and grippy Adiwear outsole combine to ensure you're always first to react on hard courts.
details: Lace closure; Mesh upper with inner knit sock; Adituff toe; Lightstrike cushioning; Adiwear outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Silver Metallic / Bright Cyan; Product code: GW3818

description:
Comfort makes all the difference. Since these juniors' Swift Run 22 Shoes are inspired by classic adidas running styles, they're all about keeping up with a fast pace. A soft EVA midsole comes in with lightweight cushioning, so no matter how you're moving, you feel supported and confident.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description: Step onto the course, step up your style and turn up your game. Every detail of the adidas CODECHAOS22 BOA spikeless golf shoes is built with a job to do. From the stance stability of the wraparound outsole to the swing-boosting traction of Twist Grip and the Energized feel of full-length BOOST, they maximize everything you need on the course — including your style. The BOA® Fit System lets you fine tune the fit and support with the turn of a dial. Tour-level performance has never looked this good.

description:
Freedom is a comfortable pair of shoes and an empty schedule waiting to be filled with adventure. So lace up in the adidas Hyperturf Adventure Shoes and explore the city. Their durable design takes cues from our outdoor archives, with ripstop mesh, suede and nubuck. Adiprene+ technology and FORMOTION keep feet feeling comfortable and fresh from morning until night.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g., cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Nubuck, suede and mesh ripstop upper; FORMOTION; Adiprene+ cushioning; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Aluminium / Grey Four / Core Black; Product code: GW7129
colors: Off White / Magic Grey / Grey One

description: Keep going hard on spicy trails in these adidas mountain bike shoes. Embrace gravity-fuelled downhills or enduro grinds in durable Five Ten shoes made for aggressive riding. description:
Unleash your full potential. Designed for the agile player, these football cleats have a low cut that lets you move around freely without weighing you down. adidas PRIMEKNIT moves with your feet and the BOOST midsole cushions every step. Vivid accents on the classic 3-Stripes let you rep your school from kickoff until the last whistle.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT textile upper; BOOST midsole; Textile lining; Synthetic stud outsole plate; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Dark Green / Team Orange / Cloud White; Product code: HR1587
colors: Light Grey / Team Maroon / Cloud White
